properties.domain: enum(Add, Modify, Hold, Cancel, Suppress, Release, Protect, Validate)

properties.comments: Assigned by server at different stages.
properties.description: Status of the document

properties.description: Version of this data model schema

properties.domain: enum(hg19, hg38, mm9, rn4, rn5, mm10)
properties.name: Genome Version
properties.description: Genome assembly version

properties.name: Maximum Alignment Length
properties.description: The maximum read alignment length supported by the software. If the software aligns the entire read, use read length.

properties.name: Mismatches Allowed
properties.description: The number of mismatches allowed in an alignment

properties.name: Alignments Allowed
properties.description: The number of locations to which a read is allowed to align

properties.name: Treatment of Multiple Alignments
properties.description: How reads aligning to multiple locations are treated

properties.name: Alignment Post-processing
properties.description: Any post-processing applied to the alignments

properties.name: Alignment Details
properties.description: Category -- Details of Alignment

properties.name: Other Molecular Identifier
properties.description: Other type of molecular identifier

properties.name: Source DB Name
properties.description: Data source name (Example: miRBase)

properties.name: Source DB Version
properties.description: Version of data source (Example: Release 19)

properties.name: Source DB URL
properties.description: URL of data source

items.name: Molecular Identifier
items.comments: enum(miRNA, piRNA, snoRNA, tRNA, rRNA, Other)
items.description: Name of molecular identifier. This field is a look-ahead search box that connects to BioPortal and retrieves a list of correct ontology terms for all possible molecular identifiers (Example: miRNA, piRNA, snRNA, snoRNA, tRNA, rRNA).

properties.name: Molecular Identifiers
properties.description: Items -- Molecular Identifiers

properties.description: Relative ID (accession) of doc - provide Document URL

properties.description: Total number of reads in this Biosample

properties.description: Total number of reads in this Biosample after clipping the 3' adapter sequence

properties.description: Total number of mapped reads in this Biosample

properties.name: Failed Quality Filter
properties.description: Total number of reads that failed the quality filter

properties.description: Total number of reads that failed the homopolymer filter

properties.description: Number of reads that mapped to calibrator sequences

properties.description: Number of reads that mapped to UniVec contaminants

properties.description: Fraction of genomic reads also mapping to the transcriptome (require 0.50 to pass)

properties.name: Cq Quantification

properties.name: Censor Value
properties.description: Value assigned to amplifications that were Censored

properties.name: Censoring Criteria
properties.description: If any of these criteria are met, data is censored for the assay; indicates miRNA expression at a level below detection threshold. Expression Suite reports undetermined for assays with no amplification. If Ampscore and CqConf are both zero, no amplification; some are not caught by Expression Suite. Cq values > 36 represent low expression miRNA (or noise) and below our detection threshold.

properties.name: Exclude Value
properties.description: Value assigned to Cq for amplifications that were excluded based on the AmpScore or CqConf values.

properties.name: Exclusion Criteria
properties.description: If any of these criteria are met, data is excluded from the analysis. Reflects technical error in the PCR.

properties.name: Other
properties.description: Other Value assigned to Cq for amplifications that were excluded based on the AmpScore or CqConf values.
